Fidget Toy - A hairbrush can be turned into a fun and relaxing fidget toy by removing the bristles and placing them in the base. You can play with the bristles between your fingers to keep your hands and mind occupied.
Hair Brush Keychain - String an old hairbrush onto a keychain to use as a unique and personalized accessory.
Bath Time Toy - Cut the bristles off and use the hairbrush as a sponge or comb to play with during bath time.
DIY Art Project - Use the hairbrush as a paintbrush to create a unique art project. The bristles will create distinctive patterns and textures.
Pet Toy - Make a fun and interactive toy for your pet by stuffing the hairbrush with catnip or cat treats.
